ygData.subject: RE: An idea for the slow day
ygData.msgSnippet: I would rather see a plus to magic built into the headbands and sashes... give them a little something to make them worth wearing. We all know they are a joke
ygData.messageBody:
I would rather see a plus to magic built into the headbands and sashes...
give them a little something to make them worth wearing. We all know they
are a joke and yet Verant seems to think that turning in a 200pp item for
1ac 1 agi increase (purple headband over red headband... at least I think
the stats are right. Something close to that anyway) is logical. I think
it's pathetic. Besides.. I could use those 2 slots in my bank vault for
something useful instead of my headband and sash. Like +magic resist items!

Praelor

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Noah D. Burt [SMTP:noahburt@...]
> Sent: Friday, August 27, 1999 3:11 PM
> To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] An idea for the slow day
>
> From: "Noah D. Burt" <noahburt@...>
>
> Yes, in all seriousness I think that we need a
> magic-based attack bonus pair of gloves. It wouldn't
> affect balance very much and would be very helpful
